title: What are the items that Rainmaker (RAKR) removes from GAAP Income in calculating Non-GAAP Net Income in FY 2007? What is the dollar impact of each of these? Express each adjustment in $M as a whole number. Finally, what is the cumulative overall effect of all of the adjustments? Express in $M and round to two decimal points.
description:
1. Retrieve the 2007 stock compensation adjustment of 1814 thousand from the 2007 10-K. 
 
 2. Retrieve the 2007 amortization of intangibles of 3065 thousand from the 2007 10-K.
 
 3. Retrieve the 2007 income tax effect of -1322 thousand from the 2007 8-K titled 'RAINMAKER REPORTS RECORD FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2007 REVENUE'
 
 4. Total all of the adjustments to reach a total effect of 3557 thousand after rounding between steps.
answer:
Rainmaker made the following adjustments:
 Stock Compensation 1.814M or ~2M
 Amortization of Intangibles 3.065M or ~3M
 Income Tax Effect -1.322M or ~1M
 Overall Effect 3.557M or 3.56M

rubric.criteria: Final answer is rounded to two decimal points = 3.56M
